verbs.description: WASHINGTON — Special counsel Robert Mueller [V: has] brought additional charges against President Donald Trump 's campaign chairman and a longtime associate , accusing them of obstructing justice .

WASHINGTON — Special counsel Robert Mueller has brought additional charges against President Donald Trump 's campaign chairman and a longtime associate , accusing [ARG0: them] of [V: obstructing] [ARG1: justice] .
